name: kapotam- my first game
description:
idk man....my dream game to make is some 2D pixel art RPG with a huge world with many features. That's a rough journey though. this stuff has been made by following a tutorial on YouTube which was painful to keep up with as there was no GUI to work with like with the game engines. I'd say this is a good start to something wonderful and new !!! I've also included the .py python file for you guys to check !! thank you for stopping by !

i will post my further game work related to top 3 game engines including unity and godot

use arrow keys to move and spacebar to shoot
